metadata.title: RHSA-2019:1708: ansible security and bug fix update (Moderate)
metadata.description:
Ansible is a simple model-driven configuration management, multi-node
deployment, and remote-task execution system. Ansible works over SSH and
does
not require any software or daemons to be installed on remote nodes.
Extension
modules can be written in any language and are transferred to managed
machines
automatically.

The following packages have been upgraded to a newer upstream version:
ansible
(2.8.2)

Security fix(es):

* ansible: unsafe template evaluation of returned module data can lead to information disclosure (CVE-2019-10156)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS
score, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the
References section.

Bug Fix(es):

See:
https://github.com/ansible/ansible/blob/v2.8.2/changelogs/CHANGELOG-v2.8.rst
for details on bug fixes in this release.

bugzilla.text: CVE-2019-10156 ansible: unsafe template evaluation of returned module data can lead to information disclosure

platform: Red Hat Ansible Engine 2.8 for RHEL 7

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
ansible is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
